outputs.name: epw_file
outputs.description:
File path to a .epw that contains all of the data in the
input _epw_obj.

inputs.name: _epw_obj
inputs.description:
An EPW object such as that exported from the Create EPW
component.

inputs.name: _folder_
inputs.description: A directory into which the .epw file will be written.

inputs.name: _file_name_
inputs.description:
An optional name for the .epw file. Default will use the
city of the EPW object's location.

inputs.name: _run
inputs.description: Set to True to run the component and write the .epw file.

name: DF Write EPW
description:
Write an EPW object into a .epw file.
-
